Name: Heavens Above
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
7.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Slightly sweet, fruity rum - hard not to like.
History: A Tiki style drink adapted from a drink featured in Jeff Berry's 'Intoxica' and originally created circa 1970 at Top of Toronto, CN Tower, Toronto, Canada.
Nutrition: One serving of Heavens Above contains 217 calories
